altTitles.ja: 平成敗残兵☆すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵⭐︎すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵すみれちゃん

description.en:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

"You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook."
Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Let's stay tuned!
description.ja: 元・売れないアイドル、現・プータローの『すみれちゃん』31歳。芸能界の熾烈な競争に敗北し、カラダもココロもボコられた彼女は、とりあえずボロアパートでゴロゴロする日々を過ごしていた。そんな彼女に目をつけた従兄弟の高校1年生『ゆうせい』が、とある儲け話を持ちかける。「カラダはいいんだから同人グラビア写真集出そうよ」。果たしてすみれちゃんは令和の世でリベンジをかませるのか！乞うご期待！

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: Saiai no Onee-sama ga Akuyaku Reijou datta no de, Kami ga Sadameta Scenario ni Aragaimasu @COMIC

altTitles.ja: 最愛のお姉様が悪役令嬢だったので、神が定めた運命（シナリオ）に抗います@COMIC

altTitles.zh: 最爱的姐姐是恶役千金、哪怕是神所定下的命运我也扭转给你看

altTitles.en: I'll Fight against the Villain's Fate That the Gods Have Ordained for My Beloved Sister! @comic

description.en:
"I will defeat the destiny that stands in my sister's way!"

The younger sister adores her older sister, the villainess, from the bottom of her heart. Without caring about how it may look, she stands up against her sister's bad end! 

An energetic loop fantasy that spans time with only love and persistence!

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: 継母の心得

description.en:
Yamazaki Misaki passed away due to illness, but when she awoke, she found that she had been reborn as a character in a manga she had read before her death — the abusive, wicked stepmother of the young protagonist.  

Only remembering this the day before her wedding, there was already no way to escape. Determined to treat her stepson well, upon meeting him, she found the boy extremely adorable! 

As she worked to raise the child well with her memories to aid her, the attitude of her cold husband began to change?!
description.ja: 病気でこの世を去ることになった山崎美咲。ところが目を覚ますと、生前読んでいたマンガの世界に転生していた。しかも、幼少期の主人公を虐待する悪辣な継母キャラとして……。前世の記憶を取り戻したのは結婚式の前日で、もはや逃げようもない。とにかく虐待しないようにしよう、と決意して対面した継子は――めちゃくちゃ可愛いんですけどー!!!　ついつい前世の知識を駆使して子育てに奮闘しているうちに、超絶冷たかった旦那様の態度も変わってきて……!?　義息子のためならチートにもなっちゃう！　愛とオタクの力で異世界の育児事情を変える、異色の子育てファンタジー、開幕！

altTitles.ja: 星刻の竜騎士

description.en:
Welcome to Ansullivan Dragonar Academy, a school with a difference: the students are dragon riders, each contracted with their own personal dragon. Ash Blake has the unique ability to ride anyone's dragon, but he's been waiting for what feels like forever for his own dragon to be born. He's thrilled when his dragon, Eco, finally appears–but she inexplicably takes the form of a beautiful human girl.  
  
Eco's peculiar appearance is only the first unusual thing Ash faces. His life is about to become a whirlwind of spies, dragon races, and unexpected attention from both the proud Princess Sylvia and the beautiful president of the student council, Rebecca. All Ash wants is to acclimate Eco to the world, but someone out there wants his strange dragon on the dissecting table!

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

title.en: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りのアラフォーリーマン、17歳の頃に戻って無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Arafour Riiman, 17-sai no Koro ni Modotte Musou suru

description.en:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
description.ja:
過労死で異世界に転生したアラフォーリーマンの難波カズ。17歳で異世界を救ったカズは、女神に「元の世界に戻してくれ」と願う。てっきり元のアラフォーリーマンに戻ると思っていたら、17歳の高校生に戻っていた。

それならばと気楽に90年代を満喫しようとしていたが、幼馴染みの由依をきっかけに『人間を喰う異形ヴァリアント』の存在を知り、カズは異世界チートを武器にこの世界でも戦いに身を投じていく…!
description.es-la: Kazu Nanba reencarnó después de la muerte por exceso de trabajo y salvó otro mundo. A la edad de 17 años en el otro mundo después de morir derrotando al rey demonio elije "regresara a su mundo original". Pensó que regresaría a su trabajo normal, pero regreso como un estudiante de secundaria de 17 años. Sin embargo ahora se entera que hay "extrañas criaturas" que matan humanos y donde Kazu recordara un recuerdo pasado donde su amiga de la infancia Yui morirá en un futuro cercano. Esta vez, para salvar a Yui, Kazu usará el poder de otro mundo para lanzarse también a la batalla en este mundo.

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Uma Musumeshi

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘プリティーダービーうまむすめし

description.en: "In their daily lives, as well as their special moments, Uma Musume enjoy eating "tasty dishes"♪"?

title.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

altTitles.ja: カッコいい女の子と12センチの約束

altTitles.ja-ro: Kakkoi Onnanoko to 12 cm no Yakusoku

altTitles.en: A Cool Girl and a 12cm Promise

altTitles.es-la: Una chica genial y una promesa de 12 cm

altTitles.vi: Lời hứa 12cm với cô gái ngầu lòi

description.en:
Tomoaki Kamba admired his boyish childhood friend, Ibuki Tachibana, and promised to become "more cool" than her.

However, four years have passed, and Ibuki has grown up to be an even more handsome girl! Their relationship is as unchanged as a 12cm height difference that cannot be filled...?

The curtain rises on a pure love story about a cool girl who is sorely in love with a boy who wants to be cool!

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.
description.ja:
椛 智明(かんば ともあき)はボーイッシュな幼なじみ、立華 一颯(たちばな いぶき)に憧れ、彼女より「もっとカッコよくなる」と約束をする。

しかし４年が経ち、一颯はさらに超イケメン女子に成長!! 二人の関係は埋まらない12センチの身長差と同じく、変わらない…？

カッコいい女の子が、カッコよくなりたい男の子にきゅんとするピュアなラブストーリーの幕開け━━。

title.en: We Want to Talk About Kaguya-sama

altTitles.ru: Мы хотим поговорить о госпоже Кагуе

altTitles.ja: かぐや様を語りたい

description.en: In this 4-koma spinoff of Kaguya Wants to be Confessed to, the members of Shuchiin's Mass Media Club, Erika Kose and Karen Kino, idolize Student Council Vice President Kaguya Shinomiya. This is the comedic tale of two delusional girls who have absolutely no idea what goes on in the Student Council room!
description.ru: Ответвление сюжета манги "Кагуя хочет, чтобы ей признались: Гении — война любви и разума". Взгляд со стороны двух участниц клуба журналистики, которые боготворят Кагую, но совершенно не представляют, что на самом деле происходит в комнате студенческого совета.

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

title.en: NEET Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: ニートくノ一となぜか同棲はじめました

altTitles.en: Somehow, I Started Living with a NEET Kunoichi

description.en:
Otaku Kunoichi ≒ Otaku NEET ≒ Girl with Zero Romantic Experience!

A normal salaryman, Tsukasa, is attacked by a Youma and is gallantly saved by the appearance of the genius kunoichi, Shizuri. However, when she is not working, she becomes an otaku NEET... Today, Tsukasa's househusband skills will continue to spoil Shizuri. A prescription delivered directly to you♪
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマン・政が妖魔に襲われていたところに颯爽と現れ、
彼を救った天才くノ一・しづり。しかし彼女は、オフにはオタクニートになってしまうのだった……。政の主夫スキルが、今もしづりを甘やかす！

altTitles.ja: 君に捧げる男前

description.en: "I'm going to tell you I love you every day!" A younger handsome guy confesses his love on their first meeting! An uneven love story between a good looking boy and a manly girl begins.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 明日ちゃんのセーラー服

description.en: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
description.es:
Akebi Komichi vive en una zona rural con su familia y acaba de conseguir entrar en la famosa Academia de secundaria Roubai, a la que ya asistió su madre. Como ella, le gustaría llevar el clásico uniforme de marinero, que ya no es el habitual en la Academia.

Después de conseguir que le permitan llevar su ansiado uniforme cosido por su madre, Akebi empezará su vida en secundaria con el objetivo de hacer muchas amigas. El paso tranquilo del tiempo, la inocencia y la naturalidad, marcarán la vida de Akebi y sus amigas.
description.ja: その“初めて”を“何度でも”──。　舞台は、田舎の名門女子中学・私立ロウ梅学園。この学園のセーラー服を着ることが「夢」だった明日小路（あけびこみち）。少女の「夢」の中学セーラー服ライフが始まる♪　広がる、緑豊かな田園風景。ゆっくり流れる青春時間。
description.es-la: El escenario es la Academia Privada Roubai, una prestigiosa escuela secundaria femenina del país. Para Akebi Komichi, ponerse el uniforme de marinera de esta escuela es un sueño hecho realidad. Su vida de ensueño en la escuela secundaria por fin comienza. Las verdes vistas del campo abierto. El lento fluir del tiempo de la juventud. Con un suave toque, el genial artista Hiro te trae este sencillo cuento escolar... ¡ahora se matricula!
description.pt-br:
A história se passa na prestigiosa Academia Roubai, uma escola secundária para garotas, no Japão. 

Nossa amável Akebi Komichi, a protagonista, entrou na academia com o sonho de vestir o lindo uniforme Sailor, porém, ela se surpreende no seu primeiro dia. O que será que aconteceu? Akebi ainda viverá muitas experiências em Roubai até se tornar uma idol como sua cantora favorita Miki-chan! Avante Akebi!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

altTitles.ja: 委員長とM子の百合

altTitles.en: Yuri Between the Class President and a Masochistic Girl
Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

altTitles.ja: お前、タヌキにならねーか?

altTitles.en: Would you like to be a Tanuki?

altTitles.vi: Bạn có muốn làm gấu mèo không?
Này, có muốn làm Tanuki không?

description.en:
"Tired of life? Be a tanuki!"

A story of being scouted by a raccoon dog when trying to die.
description.ja: 大事なことは、タヌキになったら見つかるかも。タヌキのこがね丸は、今日も山の住人を増やそうと人間たちをスカウトしに街へ繰り出す。「お前、タヌキにならねーか?」仕事に疲れたOL、 性格に難ありのホスト、親との関係に悩むいじめっ子など、様々な問題をかかえた人々が、タヌキになってみたことで人生で本当に大切なことを見つけなおしていく。
description.vi:
Ngọn đồi nơi chú gấu mèo/tanuki Kogane Maru sống ngày càng ít "cư dân" vì những chú gấu mèo ở đây lần lượt biến thành người rồi đi đến thành phố sinh sống. Vậy nên Kogane có nhiệm vụ xuống thị trấn để "chiêu mộ" thêm cư dân gấu mèo về đây ở. Kogane gặp những mảnh đời bất hạnh, những người bị bắt nạt hay những người có rắc rối với gia đình... để cho họ một cơ hội: bạn có muốn làm gấu mèo không?

Sunflower Group:
Giữa dòng đời tấp nập vô thường, bỗng có một ngày bạn nhận ra sống thật mệt mỏi.

Vất vả lắm đúng không? Chán nản lắm chứ gì? Muốn nghỉ ngơi? Muốn buông xuôi? Muốn từ bỏ? 

Đã thế thì... "Này, có muốn làm Tanuki không?"

altTitles.ja: あなたへの嘘

altTitles.vi: Những lời dối trá dành cho em

description.ja:
妻を愛する優しい夫──、それは目的のための嘘の姿だった。
（本編は1～15話で完結です。今後は余談漫画やイラストの投稿となります。）
description.vi:
*Là người chồng dịu dàng yêu thương vợ hết mực, nhưng tất cả chỉ là những dối trá được tạo ra vì một mục đích bí mật...*

Neil, một chàng trai trẻ được gọi là "chó săn của Jack" chỉ biết hoàn thành công việc theo mệnh lệnh bằng vẻ mặt vô cảm.  
Một ngày nọ, anh nhận được một nhiệm vụ mới: hãm hại một người đàn ông.  
"Hãy tước đoạt tất cả của lão ta, và cuối cùng, giết con gái lão ngay trước mặt lão."  
Với mệnh lệnh tàn nhẫn ấy, Neil khoác lên mình vỏ bọc giả tạo và trở thành hôn phu của Lily.  
Mối quan hệ giữa hai người bắt đầu từ một lời nói dối liệu rằng sẽ đi đến đâu...?

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

altTitles.en: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!

altTitles.ru: Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир!

altTitles.th: ขอให้โชคดีมีชัยในโลกแฟนตาซี

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！

altTitles.zh: 为美好的世界献上祝福！

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: ガルルガール

description.en: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...
description.es: Tras ingresar a la preparatoria, el joven, Mochizuki, se reencuentra con su primer amor, Kawa. Aunque Kawa ha crecido y se ha convertido en una hermosa y refinada jovencita, la extraña proximidad entre ellos no ha cambiado desde sus días de travesuras. Poco después de ingresar a la escuela, Mochizuki se encuentra incómodo con la transformación de Kawa en la flor inalcanzable del campus, pero un incidente desencadena el descubrimiento de su 'secreto'. La verdadera identidad de la chica de su primer amor resulta ser una chica lobo. ¿Cómo cambiará esto su relación? ¡Una comedia romántica entre un chico inocente y una chica lobo que pertenecen a diferentes razas!
description.ja: 高校入学を機に、初恋の幼馴染・河流と再会した少年・望月。入学早々、学園の高嶺の花となった河流にぎくしゃくしてしまう望月だが、とある事件をきっかけに彼女の「秘密」を知ってしまい――!?

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy.
description.ja:
「私の全てを、撮ってほしいの」

映画監督の父を持つ男子高校生・白沢明人はとある放課後に同級生・本上夏帆の自慰行為を目撃してしまう。困惑しながらもついスマホでそれを盗撮する白沢。しかしそれに気づいた本上は、白沢に驚きの提案を持ちかけて…!?
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

title.en: Neko no Inai Isekai ni Neko ga Tensei Shichatta Ohanashi

altTitles.ja: 猫のいない異世界に猫が転生しちゃったお話
転生しても猫は猫

altTitles.ja-ro: Neko no Inai Isekai ni Neko ga Tensei Shi Chatta Ohanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Cat Reincarnated in a Different World Where There Are No Cats

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shite mo Neko wa Neko

description.en: A story about a cat reincarnated in a different world where there are no cats.
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre um gato reencarnado em um mundo diferente onde não há gatos.

altTitles.ja: 恋より青く

description.en:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.
description.ja: 好きなことが見つけられず、放課後を持て余す女子高生・高峯。ある日、電車内で落とした本を取り違えたことから読書好きの他校の生徒・咲倉と出会う。「本」を介した放課後のみの不思議な交流の中、高峯と咲倉はお互いに惹かれ始めていき――。友情でも恋愛でもない、ふたりだけの名前のない関係性を育む少女たちの青い春――。

altTitles.ja: コットン

description.en: Manga adaptation of the video game Cotton: Fantastic Night Dreams that was serialized in Comic Gamest.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

description.en: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity I: Quarantined Territory of Malice, Shinjuku - Shinjuku Phantom Incident

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点Ⅰ 悪性隔絶魔境 新宿 新宿幻霊事件

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten I: Akushou Kakuzetsu Makyou, Shinjuku - Maboroshi Tamashi Jiken

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпопея Остатка-Псевдосингулярность I: Карантинная территория злого умысла, Синдзюку- Инцидент Фантома Синдзюку

description.en:
The curtain rises on Pseudo-Singularity I.
The stage: Shinjuku. Fight alongside mysterious new Servants in a prison district cut off from the outside world.
description.ru: Новая сингулярность, которая появилась перед Рицуко Фуджимару, который спас мир. Чтобы исправить искажение истории, Фуджимару, который был перемещен в Синдзюку в 1999 год, встречает одного слугу, который называет себя «Арчер Синдзюку». В городе, где широко распространено зло, открывается занавес истории первого фрагмента!

altTitles.ja: JESUS 砂塵航路

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

altTitles.ja: リストルージュ

description.en: In a world where humans are protected by the Chimera tribe as an endangered species. As he spends time with a human girl, a certain emotion begins to grow in the heart of a Chimera boy.....!

altTitles.ja: 恋する鬼畜島

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Đường Ở Đảo Quái Dị

description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

altTitles.es-la: El Reinicio Como Sanador ~La Magia de Muerte Instantánea Con La Habilidad de Copiar La Curación Trascendental~

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaifuku Jutsushi Yarinaoshi: Sokushi Mahou to Skill Copy no Chouetsu Heal

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し～即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール～
Redo OF healer
回復術士のやり直し

description.de: Keyaru wurde durch sein Unwissen immer und immer wieder ausgenutzt. Aber eines Tages erkannte er die wahre Macht der Heilmagie und kam zu der Überzeugung, dass ein Heiler die stärkste Klasse sei. Wie auch immer, ehe ihm das Potential eines Heilers klar wurde, war er bereits allem beraubt worden. Daher wandte er seine Heilmagie auf die Welt selbst an und reiste so 4 Jahre in der Zeit zurück. Er würde sich für alles rächen, was man ihm angetan hatte. Dies ist die kranke heldenhafte Geschichte eines Heilers, der der stärkste wurde, indem er sein Wissen über Heilung und seine Erfahrungen aus seinem vorherigen Leben kombiniert.
description.en:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."   
Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others.  
But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.  
This is a heroic tale of one healing magician who became the strongest by using knowledge from his past life and healing magic.
description.it:
"I maghi curatori non possono combattere da soli." Keyaru, che era legato a questa conoscenza comune, fu sfruttato più e più volte dagli altri.  
Ma un giorno notò cosa c'era oltre la guarigione della magia e si convinse che il mago guaritore fosse la classe più forte. Tuttavia, quando ne realizzò il potenziale, fu privato di tutto. Così, usando la magia curativa sul mondo stesso, è tornato indietro di quattro anni, determinato a ricominciare tutto da capo.
description.pl:
"Uzdrowiciele nie mogą walczyć w pojedynkę."  
Keare, który wiedział o tym aż za dobrze, był raz po raz wykorzystywany przez innych.  
Ale pewnego dnia odkrywa coś, co kryje się poza magią uzdrowienia, i zyskuje pewność, że uzdrowiciel to najpotężniejsza z klas maga. Jednakże zanim zdał sobie sprawę z jej potencjału, został już pozbawiony wszystkiego, co miał. Dlatego właśnie użył magii uzdrowienia na samym świecie, by cofnąć się w czasie o cztery lata, postanawiając, że zacznie wszystko od nowa.  
Oto heroiczna opowieść o pewnym uzdrowicielu, który stał się najsilniejszym dzięki wykorzystaniu wiedzy z dawnego życia i magii uzdrawiania.
description.pt-br:
"Magos de cura não podem lutar sozinhos." 

Keare, que estava vinculado por esse conhecimento comum, foi explorado uma vez ou outra pelos outros. Mas um dia, ele notou o que estava além da magia de cura e estava convencido de que um mago de cura era a classe mais forte. No entanto, quando percebeu esse potencial, ele estava privado de tudo. Assim, ele usou a magia de cura no próprio mundo para voltar quatro anos, decidindo refazer tudo. Este é um conto heroico de um mago de cura que se tornou o mais forte usando o conhecimento de sua vida passada e magia de cura.

altTitles.ja: 怖れ -令和怪談-

description.en: An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable, everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties, focusing on the fears lurking within daily life, which continue to escalate.
description.ja: 令和を象徴するテーマを扱った、極上の現代オムニバスホラー。あなたの身に起こるかもしれない“怖れ”。そんな日常で感じる恐怖や不安は、今日から更に増殖していく――。

altTitles.ja: おっぱい百合アンソロジー

altTitles.en: The Secret Kiss Should Be On The Breasts
Being Taught By A JK About The Joys Of One's Gender Who's In Their 30's

description.en:
A yuri anthology focused on boobs!  
More than a dozen of wonderful authors bringing you some ecchi and funny boob-centric yuri stories!  

Cover: [Konbu Wakame](https://mangadex.org/author/580a9899-14f8-4ef6-a156-bcf1ed53e119)
Illustration: Kagawa Yuusaku

**Chapters**:
1. **The Secret Kiss Should Be On The Breasts** by Kurou
2. **I've Become An Adult, Right?** by Hachiko
3. **Being Taught By A JK About The Joys Of One's Gender Who's In Their 30's** by Endo
4. **Drunk Oppai Discussion** by Kanro Ame
5. **Luring Bloom** by Majoccoid
6. **Intense Boobs Discourse** by Homura Subaru
7. **Senpai And Me** by Hisagi
8. **Oppai ≤ You** by Kisaragi Mizu & Doggy
9. **Love Breasts** by Yuino Chiri
10. **Forest of Flower Garden** by Kanda Dan
11. **Oppai Facts** by Guu
12. **The Student Council's Idle Talk** by Itou Hachi

altTitles.ja: 終の退魔師―エンダーガイスター

altTitles.th: มือปราบปิศาจคนสุดท้าย ENDER GEISTER

altTitles.vi: Chung Chi Thối Ma Sư -Ender Geister-

description.en: Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
description.es: Akira es un exorcista de clase S que es enviado desde Alemania para investigar un incidente sobrenatural en cierta ciudad de Japón. Él y su compañera, la hermoso exorcista Chikage, acabarán a las criaturas que han venido de otro mundo.
description.id: Akira adalah pengusir setan kelas S yang dikirim dari Jerman untuk menyelidiki insiden supernatural di kota tertentu di Jepang. Dia dan rekannya, pengusir setan cantik Chikage, akan menghabisi makhluk yang datang dari dunia lain.
description.ja:
この主人公、破天荒にして最強の退魔師＜エクソシスト＞

日本のとある都市で起きた超常現象事件を調査しに、ドイツから派遣されたS級退魔師アキラ。相棒の美人退魔師チカゲと共に異世界よりやってきたクリーチャー共を撃ち！殴り！ぶったおしまくる！！
description.pt-br: Este protagonista, o mais demonicamente poderoso exorcista. Akira, o exorcista de classe S, foi enviado da Alemanha para investigar um evento paranormal em uma certa cidade do Japão. Ele atira em criaturas de outros mundos com sua bela parceira exorcista, Chikage.

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

title.en: Kouiu gyappu kappuru ga mechakucha suki tte iu dake no hanashi

altTitles.vi: Chả là tôi thích kiểu 'gap couple' thế này

altTitles.ja: こういうギャップカップルがめちゃくちゃ好きっていうだけの話

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: After the Rain

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件 after the rain

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais: After the Rain

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten: After the Rain

altTitles.uk: Сусідський ангел сильно мене балує: Бісля дощу

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まり二人は少しずつ惹かれあっていく――。

title.en: I Want to Live a Good Life

description.en: The best in the world, excellent martial arts, overflowing money and pleasure----the center of the magical world, Black Astronomy. Kang Hee-ran, the granddaughter of the owner of Heukcheonmun, lives a life that has nothing to lack and nothing to be envied of, but dies at the hands of her stepmother. And for some reason, Heeran reverted to her younger self! In the life that started again, she goes down quietly and kindly with her warm nanny. The first step of revenge begins with making the third Confucius, Kang Lun, the king of the underworld who will soon rule Black Astronomy, into a man of Heiran...!!  I was trying to live...  Heeran's stepmother didn't like the way he looked and started to kill all of Heeran's people.  And Heeran went to the bottom of the Dark Astronomical Gate to the realm of the deep hell for revenge.

altTitles.ja: 踊り場にスカートが鳴る

altTitles.en: The Skirt Sings at the Landing
The Skirt Rings at the Landing

description.en:
Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine "follower" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine "leader" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  
  
Bimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.
description.es-la: Haruma Kiki siempre soñó con hacer bailes de salón como el papel de "seguidora" femenina, pero a medida que pasaban los años solo crecía más y más alta, lo que finalmente hizo que renunciara a verse bien con un vestido o cualquier cosa de dama. Ahora, en su segundo año de secundaria, se especializa en el papel de "líder" masculina, hasta que un día, su pareja la abandona de repente. Cuando Toribami Michiru, una pequeña y linda chica de primer año, aparece queriendo unirse al club de baile de salón, Kiki le pide que sea su nueva compañera, pero Michiru revela que ella solo juega el papel de líder, y ella no quiere nada menos que a Kiki como su compañera.

altTitles.en: The Male Lead Is in Charge of the Successor
The Dark History of the Male Lead

altTitles.th: พระเอกบอกให้ฉันรับผิดชอบยุคมืดของเขา

altTitles.ja: 黒歴史の責任を取れですって!?

altTitles.zh: 男主要我对他的黑历史负责

description.en: After being neglected in her past life, Izelle is ecstatic to be reborn as a rich character until her family suddenly goes bankrupt! While thinking about what to do, she's given the perfect chance to solve her financial crisis when she saves young Archduke Karl Byron from being bullied. Unfortunately, Karl doesn't remember her at all when they reunite as adults, and she has no choice but to coerce him into helping her. Can Izelle get what she wants, or will Karl be more trouble than he's worth?

title.en: Forget My Husband, I'll Go Make Money

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.uk: Годі з мене чоловіка - йду заробляти гроші

altTitles.zh: 要什么老公，我只想搞钱

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.es-la: Terminé con mi esposo, ahora iré a hacer dinero

description.en:
I became the wife of a husband who has a girlfriend.
Hmm, I shouldn’t bother them, right?

“Then, you sleep on the floor.”
“What?”

It seems that he doesn’t like the idea of it.
Well, the floor is hard after all.
I guess I don’t have any other choice.

“We’ll just sleep while holding hands then. You trust me, right?”

But how did we end up breaking the bed on our first night…?

I am Aristine, an exiled princess who has fallen out of favor with the Emperor.
The truth is, she has the <Monarch’s Eyes>, an ability that allows you to see the past, future, and present.
Sacrificed for a contract marriage, she is bound together with a monstrous barbarian…

“I have to present my wife with the most precious things.”

The future husband who is rumored to be a monster is incredibly normal.

But this cake belongs to someone else.

“I’ll just go and make money.”

It’s long been said that imagining gold as your own will help you manifest wealth.

<Forget My Husband, I’ll Go Make Money>
Will she be able to achieve her dreams of living in freedom while sitting on her piles of money?
Or will she be able to catch both rabbits at the same time?

altTitles.es-la: El diario de crianza con el Villano

description.en: Mary didn’t know what to expect of the afterlife, but it certainly wasn’t becoming the evil, murderous nanny of the novel she was reading. Her circumstances become secondary concerns when she realizes that no matter what, Briel must remain safe. It’s the only way to keep his uncle, Count Kentryle Chalant, from the path of revenge. Can she keep her new charge safe and change the entire plot, or will the true villain get the best of them all? And is she going to find love on the way?

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: Prices Depreciated, and I Became the World's Richest Person

altTitles.zh: 开局物价贬值，我成为了世界首富

description.en: I woke up to find the world had changed! Prices everywhere have decreased by a million times, yet my funds remain the same, making me wealthier than the world’s richest person! How should I spend all this money…
